protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the interconversion of N-acetylglucosamine to N-acetylmannosamine. Binds to renin forming a protein complex called high molecular weight (HMW) renin and inhibits renin activity. Involved in the N-glycolylneuraminic acid (Neu5Gc) degradation pathway: although human is not able to catalyze formation of Neu5Gc due to the inactive CMAHP enzyme, Neu5Gc is present in food and must be degraded.

pathway.name: Amino sugar and nucleotide sugar metabolism

go_class.description: intramolecular oxidoreductase activity, interconverting aldoses and ketoses
